verses.text:
tapa:svaadhyaayanirata. tapasvii vaagvidaa. varam |
naarada. paripapraccha vaalmiikirmunipu.gavam || 0 ||
verses.translation:
The ascetic Valmiki asked Narada, the best of the eloquent [and] most eminent sage,
[who was] deeply engaged in austerity and study:
wordByWord: deeply engaged in austerity and study, lit. "austerity-study-engaged"
Third Person Singular Perfect Active Indicative
